short_summary: Consultation services for  Information Technology  and specialized architect services.
description: Informatics professional services with the provision of Application Developer/Software Architect Services specialized in both Java and Cloud, Technical Architect Services specialized in Cobol, and Business Architect Services.
full_summary:
*** **Title** (English and French)
-------------------------------
*   **English Title:** Professional Informatics Services (JAVA, COBOL, Cloud)
*   **French Title:** SERVICES INFORMATIQUES PROFESSIONNELS (JAVA, COBOL, NUAGE)

*** **Tender ID**
----------------
*   **ID:** WS3697381282-Doc3697388768
*   **Amendment No.:** 5
*   **Solicitation No.:** WS3697381282

*** **Posting Information**
------------------------
*   **Publication Date:** 15 December 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 14 February 2023, 14:00 EST
*   **Amendment Date:** 01 February 2023
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 07 February 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** None

*** **Description**
----------------
*   **English Description:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals for Professional Informatics Services (JAVA, COBOL, Cloud). Suppliers must provide Application Development/Software Architecture Services, specialized in both Java and Cloud Technical Architecture Services, specialized in Cobol, and Business Architecture Services.

*** **Selection Criteria**
-------------------------
*   Proposals will be evaluated based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

*** **Eligible Respondents**
-------------------------
*   Only TBIPS SA Holders holding a TBIPS SA for Tier 2 at the time of bid closing, in all required resource categories in this solicitation and in the NCR under the EN578-170432 series of SAs are eligible to compete.

*** **Contract Details**
---------------------
*   Two to three (2-3) contracts will be awarded for a term of three (3) years plus two (2) one-year irrevocable options to extend.
*   Respondents should submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission on 14 February 2023 by 14:00 EST.

*** **Contact Information**
-----------------------
*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
*   Gatineau, Quebec  K1A 0S5
*   Canada
*   Phone: None
*   Email: [sylvie.cloutier2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sylvie.cl
